Articles.Content:
A compact SSTO capable of placing small payload to LKO and/or crew transfers.

![AMMP8qp.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/AMMP8qp.jpg)

[http://kerbalx.com/iVG/Sabre-MK3-12T-to-LKO](http://kerbalx.com/iVG/Sabre-MK3-12T-to-LKO)

Performance after 1.0.2: 3 tonnes to LKO, make sure you will the wings with LF by right-clicking them, you will need it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T20:00:08Z" title="05/02/2015 08:00  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by iVG**
No pics, no clicks. Also, try to add a better description, and possibly an action group setup.
There is a picture, action groups and description.

Here's his pic (lifted from link in OP)

![AMMP8qp.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/AMMP8qp.jpg)
Oh, he meant in the thread... ! Thanks @Slam\_Jones.
The craft has been promoted to 3 tonnes to LKO after 1.0.2
